desc: Process normalized expression dataframe into compatible PRESCIENT file format.
name: process_data

params.name: data_path
params.help: Path to normalized expression CSV.

params.name: out_dir
params.help: Directory to store PRESCIENT torch object.

params.name: meta_path
params.help: Path to metadata CSV containing timepoint and celltype annotation data.

params.name: tp_col
params.help: Column name of timepoint feature in metadata provided as string.

params.name: celltype_col
params.help: Column name of timepoint feature in metadata provided as string.

params.name: num_pcs
params.help: Define number of PCs to compute for input to training.

params.name: num_neighbors_umap
params.help: Define number of neighbors for UMAP trasformation (UMAP used only for visualization.)

params.name: growth_path
params.help: Path to torch pt file containg pre-computed growth weights. See vignette notebooks for generating growth rate vector.

desc: Train a PRESCIENT model using a PRESCIENT data object as input.
name: train_model

params.name: data_path
params.help: Path to PRESCIENT data torch object produced by process_data.

params.name: weight_name
params.help: Descriptive name of weight vector being used provided as string for model filename.

params.name: loss
params.help: Designate distance function for loss.

params.name: k_dim
params.help: Designate activation function for layers of NN.

params.name: activation
params.help: Designate hidden units of fully connected layers in model.

params.name: layers
params.help: Number of layers for neural network parameterizing the potential function.

params.name: pretrain_lr
params.help: Learning rate for Adam optimizer during pretraining.

params.name: pretrain_epochs
params.help: Number of epochs for pretraining with contrastive divergence.

params.name: train_epochs
params.help: Number of epochs for training.

params.name: train_lr
params.help: Learning rate for Adam optimizer during training.

params.name: train_dt
params.help: Timestep for simulations during training.

params.name: train_sd
params.help: Standard deviation of Gaussian noise for simulation steps.

params.name: train_tau
params.help: Tau hyperparameter of PRESCIENT.

params.name: train_batch
params.help: Batch size (fraction) for training.

params.name: train_clip
params.help: Gradient clipping threshold for training.

params.name: save
params.help: Save model every n epochs.

desc: Simulate cellular trajectories using a trained PRESCIENT model and a PRESCIENT data object.
name: simulate_trajectories

params.name: data_path
params.help: Path to PRESCIENT training file (stored in out_dir of process_data command).

desc: Simulate unperturbed and perturbed simulations of cells using a trained PRESCIENT model and a PRESCIENT data object.
name: perturbation_analysis

params.name: data_path
params.help: Path to PRESCIENT data file stored as a torch pt.

params.name: model_path
params.help: Path to directory containing PRESCIENT model for simulation.
